title: Foundation Building - Week 4
subtitle: Consolidating habits and preparing for progression
videoDescription: Reflect on your progress and prepare for the next level of your journey.
description: Congratulations on completing Foundation Building! This week we'll assess your progress and prepare you for the next level of your movement journey.
keyPoints: Celebrate every milestone - you've come far!
Reflect on what worked well for you
You're ready for the next challenge
